text: We’ll hear first in No. 71-81, United States against Biswell.
Mr. Chief Justice and may it please the Court.
But there’s a little difference between a liquor and a gun?
Unless you can flush a gun down the toilet.

I believe, Your Honor, that for all relevant purposes, if that kind of search is -- or inspection is sustainable with respect to liquor industry it should be sustainable with respect to regulation of the gun industry.
Mr. Chief Justice and if it please the Court.
